#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<limits>
#include<queue>
#include<string.h>
#include<set>
#define ll long long
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   int t,i;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {char s[1002];
   int c[26]={0},f1=1,f2=1,j;
       cin>>s;
       int l=strlen(s);
       for(i=0;i<l;i++)
        c[s[i]-'a']++;
       for(i=0,j=l-1;i<l/2;i++,j--)
       {
           if(s[i]!=s[j])
           {
               f1=0;
               break;
           }
       }


    for(i=0;i<26;i++)
    {
        if(c[i]==0)
        {
            f2=0;
            break;
        }
    }
    if(f1 and f2)
        cout<<"palingram\n";
    else if(f1)
        cout<<"palindrome\n";
    else if(f2)
        cout<<"pangram\n";
    else
        cout<<"none\n";
    }
}
